text: Hi everyone. My name is Johann and I just started as a full stack developer at a company that uses HubSpot. My current focus is the HubSpot CMS for Developers Certification which is going well so far. I look forward to interacting with all of you.

<@U072PLHFTB8> Good luck with the certification!
This community is great :ok_hand:
If you have any questions about HubSpot CMS feel free to reach out
